entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking bemused and then seriously alarmed. He is also referred to as 'you' by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to get Ron's attention and explain something to him.

entities.name: horse
entities.description: The horse is described as 'gleaming solidly' in front of Harry.

entities.name: coach
entities.description: The coach is mentioned as being pulled by the horse.

relationships.description: Harry asks Ron if he can see what's pulling the carriages.
Harry observes the horse in front of him.
Ron is aware that the coach is being pulled by something, but he can't see what it is.
